Name: Base Station License, Approval, Atlantic Car Service, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Atlantic Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Atlantic Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 3207 Fulton Street in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately. 


LS#2621
